item.title: Trump’s DOE proposes cutting billions in grants for GM, Ford, and lots of startups
item.description: Trump's Department of Energy wants to cancel billions more in awards that were granted by the Biden administration, and startups are in the crosshairs...

item.title: Wall Street analysts explain how AMD’s own stock will pay for OpenAI’s billions in chip purchases
item.description: AMD's unusual deal to finance OpenAI's chip purchases could grant the AI model maker up to $100 billion, analyst estimates.

item.title: Google launches its AI vibe-coding app Opal in 15 more countries
item.description: The app, which lets you create mini web apps using text prompts, is now available in Canada, India, Japan, South Korea, Vietnam, Indonesia, Brazil, Si...

item.title: How Otter.ai’s CEO is pushing the company to be more than just a meeting scribe
item.description: Otter is launching a suite of enterprise tools to help companies use its tech to create a central knowledge base.

item.title: Tesla reveals slightly cheaper ‘standard’ versions of the Model 3 and Model Y
item.description: The long-awaited cheaper Model 3 and Model Y are finally here, but they start at $36,990 and $39,990, respectively -- just a few thousand dollars less...
